thread.title: 10 Hidden Disney Movie Crossover Easter Eggs
thread.title_full: 10 Hidden Disney Movie Crossover Easter Eggs

author: Kofi Outlaw
title: 10 Hidden Disney Movie Crossover Easter Eggs
text:
10 Hidden Disney Movie Crossover Easter Eggs Kofi Outlaw Start Slideshow Slide of 
Disney 's live-action Beauty and the Beast hits theaters this week, bringing that "Tale as old as time" back around for another chance to bring Disney magic into the lives of viewers all over the world. 
By now, Beauty and the Beast and so many other classic stories that were given the Disney animated treatment do in fact feel like 'tales' that have been around forever - stories that anyone over the age of six knows by heart. That's a funny (and specious) confidence to have; as it turns out, fans may not know all of their favorite Disney films as well as they may have thought. 
Here are 10 Disney Movie Details You Never Spotted .
